Query the Ensembl REST API

Source: R/analysis_information.R
queryEnsembl.Rd

Query the Ensembl REST API

Usage

queryEnsembl(path, query, grch37 = TRUE)

Arguments

path

Character: API path

query

Character: API query

grch37

Boolean: query the Ensembl GRCh37 API? if FALSE, query the most recent API

Value

Parsed response or NULL if no response

Examples

path  <- "overlap/region/human/7:140424943-140624564"
query <- list(feature = "gene")
psichomics:::queryEnsembl(path, query, grch37 = TRUE)
#>                                                                   description
#> 1 v-raf murine sarcoma viral oncogene homolog B [Source:HGNC Symbol;Acc:1097]
#> 2                               U6 spliceosomal RNA [Source:RFAM;Acc:RF00026]
#>   version external_name                          logic_name       end
#> 1       8          BRAF ensembl_havana_gene_homo_sapiens_37 140624564
#> 2       1            U6               ncrna_homo_sapiens_37 140583978
#>   assembly_name feature_type     start         gene_id strand        biotype
#> 1        GRCh37         gene 140419127 ENSG00000157764     -1 protein_coding
#> 2        GRCh37         gene 140583872 ENSG00000271932      1          snRNA
#>                id canonical_transcript         source seq_region_name
#> 1 ENSG00000157764    ENST00000288602.6 ensembl_havana               7
#> 2 ENSG00000271932    ENST00000605989.1        ensembl               7

path  <- "lookup/symbol/human/BRCA2"
query <- list(expand=1)
psichomics:::queryEnsembl(path, query, grch37 = TRUE)
